title: FC Versailles 78 - Wikipedia
snippet: The club is an official academy of the French Football Federation. Since 2024, the club has been partially owned by French Formula One driver Pierre Gasly. FC Versailles was formed in 1989 as the result of a merger between Racing Club Versailles and Companion Sports Versailles.

title: r/formula1 on Reddit: Pierre Gasly becomes the 3rd partner owner of FC Versailles
snippet: Pierre Gasly arriving at the track wearing the football jersey from the club he part owns, FC Versailles

title: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly becomes French football club's co-owner
snippet: Formula 1 driver Pierre Gasly has become co-owner of FC Versailles, a semi-professional French football club based near Paris.

title: Pierre Gasly explains his other job: Football team co-owner
snippet: Alpine's Pierre Gasly talks about becoming co-owner of French football club FC Versailles and needing more than 'just Formula 1'.

title: F1 driver Pierre Gasly invests in French third-tier football club FC Versailles - Sportstar
snippet: Formula One driver and Paris St Germain fan Pierre Gasly has become an investor in third-tier French semi-professional football club FC Versailles. The 28-year-old, who drives for Renault-owned Alpine, was announced on the clubâ€™s website on ...
